`` john dickinson samuel ward dear sir fairhill january 29th. 1775 several causes prevented answering early wishd favour last month 1 intelligence contain 'd much oblig 'd. instructions delegates appointed next congress appear exceedingly proper heartily wish every colony may give full authority delegates. subject apprehensions province. party considerable weight assembly greatly alarm 'd vote approving generally proceedings late congress determined possible stop vigorous proceedings prevailing assembly give restrictive instructions delegates appointed next congress. assembly meets 20th next month according best opinion form good deal delicacy requir 'd managing affair. 2 provincial convention lately called considering february 4 1775 peculiar circumstances province heartily wish meeting delayed. see proceedings paper. nothing could done time prudence. great point present keep appearance unbroken harmony public measures fear encouraging great britain hostilities otherwise would avoid. made choice proves inimical hope every man sense virtue america draw sword without regard yet respectable doctrine disunion. may infinite goodness avert occasion period arrives firmly believe province spirited exertions merit esteem every honest colonist. dear sir great truth affectionate humble servant john dickinson p.s. please present compliments brother. shall oblig 'd sir let person copy letter may trouble -- sentences ``

`` richard henry lee samuel adams virginia 4th february 1775. discusses conditions virginia. continues `` doubt seen speech parliament thence may judge ministerial enemies propose us. `` letter london 6th december says 'the present intention ministry declare meetings associations america illegal treasonable -- guard coast traffic communication holland france spain. corrupt n. york employ military force chiefly canada necessary. designs attention bent defeat earnestness greatest question world demands. `` added understand propose forfiet confiscate estates meet associate combine commerce gt. britain. acts pass proper america declare essentially vile void whoever takes claims estate said forfieted shall deemed public enemy shall meretorious february 4 1775 person put claimant death. would probably deter defeat wicked design. find ministerial manoeuvre dissolving parliament notwithstanding timely warning junius answered purpose far rest matter firmness virtue general exertion people england. tho latter fail us hope former immovable.\ `` concludes plea news massachusetts ``

`` john adams abigail adams dear phyladelphia june 2. 1775 yesterday pleasure two letters dr. church. 1 long without intelligence country sight dr. gave us great joy. received letters england untill dr. brought one mr. dilly. mr. henly goes tomorrow camp cambridge. ill left tho well. bass recover 'd small pox. debates deliberations tedious nine four five near six. determinations slow -- hope sure. congress support us way. precisely way could wish better way could well expect considering heterogeneous body. prospect crops southern colonies never exceeded. become immense quantities provisions non exportation takes place cant conceive. surely shant starve. poor bostonians. heart bleeds day night. god preserve bless. frightened sheep stealers got drubbing grape island. father smith prayed scough crew doubt dear friend dr. tufts sustain shock. duty love others justly claim. dear nabby johnny charley tommy never thoughts. god bless preserve prosper. need send money shall want supplied colleagues repaid return. dr. warren writes brother. love brothers duty mother uncle quincy. tell hope company continue exercises. would burst see whole companies armed quakers city uniforms going thro manual maneuvres like regular troops. j.a ``

`` samuel ward samuel ward jr. dear son philadelphia 9th june 1775 tho fatigued thinking writing almost whole day omit favourable opportunity writing. mentioned amongst things necessity mens clean dressing victuals properly. beginning last war great numbers died wholly want care. see people vegetables got lie dry conveniently may one word time keep proper authority take possible care. dont suffer idle hand dont make duty severe. l remember dear son said left home fear cannon musket ball bayonet instrument death virtuous vice enemy truly feared. shun every form possible especially instances mentioned. like deceivers promise much however flowery gay paths may first lead may certainly terminate misery ruin. dr. church favor take charge tell news. congress taken many spirited measures transpire season army may rely upon effectually provided supported. give affectionate regards general officers. think much shall every thing power service. shall write genl. first opportunity. affec. father sam ward ``

`` richard henry lee george washington dear sir philadelphia 29th june 1775 nothing material occurred since left place except imperfect accounts charleston battle upon whole seems nothing unfavorable great cause loss dr. warren. infant country loss indeed deprived wise virtuous brave citizens. hope however still hear enemies lost characters useful. received account engagement late saturday evening last us immediately applied prevailed committee city dispatch 90 odd quarter casks powder camp hope arrive safe good time. day informed congress six nations canada indians firmly disposed observe strick neutrality think shall endeavor cultivate friendship. congress engaged two days mutiny military regulations last shall adopt massachusetts alterations. 1 see taken business entering canada left propriety gener. schuyler. done manner agreeable canadians certainly shut door dangerous tampering indians western frontiers. nothing yet done military hospital 2 suppose shall wait return state army. dr. shippen says three young gentlemen perfectly compitent ready called serve capacity surgeons. june 30 1775 assure always make happy hear great regard dear sir affect. obedient servant. richard henry lee ``

`` samuel adams james warren dear sir philada july 2 1775. messrs. hall maryland arrivd cambridge place left 22 ult. brot us one letter viz good friend coll palmer. glad hear number killed wounded side enemy amounts many 1000. dare say would grudge every last hill near upon terms. gentleman new york son mr. phillip livingston one delegates place writes pilot brot nautil us ship war lately boston reports heard officers board frequently lament death general howe. true rejoyce man deservd die ingratitude. indeed friend cause suffers receiving frequent particular accounts. delegates three colonies better intelligence near boston. know nothing disposition army even commanded late important engagement. know hands full business may committee appointed collect send us material intelligence. regular post hardly think worth send servant office letters. thousand things say write. flatter self essential service common cause would tarry moment. matters agreed many talkd know pleasd -- let tell patience wd tried. power man create events. business foresee far able prepare improve. opinion great ones produced short time. perhaps july 2 1775 may sufferd live enjoy -- find honour publickly proscribd infamous traitor. express contempt proclamation. 1 fate always hurry. adieu. p.s. love circle ``

`` john adams abigail adams octr. 23. 1775 yesterday octr. 9th. came hand. letters never failed give pleasure-the greatest pleasure take receiving. altho every one yet come hand replete melancholly tidings yet truly say never earnest receive. rejoice happy principles happy temper apparently dictated. feel much affected breach upon family. count mother brother aunt brothers child among slain cruel pestilence. may god almighty put stop rage humble us ravages already made. sorrows friends loss mother never mind. pray god spare parent whose life prolonged goodness hitherto well survives. tremendous calamities already felt fire sword pestilence may harbingers greater still. security calamities here-this planet region. principle prepared worst events. could write well sorrows would eloquent upon word. unaccountable event allude reached place occasioned fall. 1 would glad however worst construction might put. let fair play-tho doubt. october 23 1775 man violates private faith cancells solemn obligations neither honour conscience holds shall never knowingly trusted. known first voted director hospital heard afterwards would voted. open barefaced immorality ought countenanced. tho think fatality attends us instances yet divine protection favour visible others let us chearfull whatever happens. chearfullness sin times. afraid hear almost least sick house. yet hope better reassume wonted chearfullness write upon news politics. send letters warren conveyance. wont trust ``

`` john adams james warren dear sir octr. 23. 1775 12th instant came hand yesterday. thank good lady kind condolance loss excellent mother 1 loss ought particularly affecting reason fear kind exertions relief family great distress contributed catastrophe. dread hear family least pestilential infection seized branch it-but hope better things. dont think negligent friend much experience care attention. thought duty omit oppertunity press accounts c. wish friends little chargeable negligence. want know thousand things. prices european west india goods. non exportation observed. prices provisions. whether prospect keeping trade alive. receive letter comtee 2 whose business prepare compleat narration war-at least murders robberies piracies treasons felonies villanies c army navy. mr wythe one virginian lawyer high rank bar great schollar indefatigable man staunch virginian appearance. observe vote limits us last march. done without design dont intend limited therefore hope october 23 1775 two houses appoint committee upon larger scale collect facts least port bill i.e. time took place. hope neither time trouble expence spared upon occasion account expence kept province altho authority say paid yet believe continent. compliments mrs warren-tell rather received letter promise one tho valuable ``

`` john adams james warren dear sir octr. 24. i.e. 23 1775 time acquaint yesterday eminent american worthy man honourable peytonn randolph esqr first venerable president departed life apoplectic fit. seized table moments. set good deal company dinner. died evening without ever recovering senses first stroke. gentleman sustained deservedly one first american characters first president united colonies universally esteemed great virtues shining abilities congress determind shew memory remains possible demonstrations respect. 1 whole body attend funeral much mourning laws admit. funeral tomorrow. pleased respect account impropriety know unfelt. 2 venerable sage assure since stood upon floor rest us rose esteem. attentive judicious knowledge eloquence classical correctness shewed us able experienced statesman senator whereas former station great measure concealed shewed us chiefly upright impartial moderator debate. would wondered want sensi bility remarked seen difference. mr randolph firm stable consistent patriot here-the loss must great virginia particular continent general. october 23 1775 sometimes wonder similar fate befall members. minds engaged bodies little exercised apt fall. goes mr gawen brown ``

`` samuel adams elbridge gerry dear sir philadelphia octob 23 1775 much obligd favor 9th instant receivd post. shall make best use. affords intelligence importance already communicated confidential friends. 1 hope continue write every opportunity. bearer letter mr. gawen brown moment informd setts early tomorrow morning cambridge place residence evening tell present write fully next opportunity. great esteem affectionate friend saml adams p.s. yesterday peyton randolph esqr one virginia delegates seizd apoplectict fit died hours. regards friends. beg favor forward inclosd speedy safe hand ``

`` james duane robert livingston dear honourd sir philad 23d octob. 1775 pleased accept best thanks kind letter 4th instant. sincerely join dreading seperation great britain acceptable. wisdom banished king 's councils petitions america longer disregarded must flatter last congress altogether unexceptionable even despotic court produce conference accommodation constitutional permanent basis. thank intelligence lieut thomas particular respects congress accounts. suppose genl montgomerie shelter troops montreal whenever pleases changes frequent reliefes able keep october 23 1775 field long necessary capture st john 's agree supplied manner canadian prisoners represent. hoped subject letter news england prints furnish whole amounts surmise conjecture. administrations disposed peace think woud come conclusion without advice parliament support whose usurped authority cruel unnatural war prosecuted. therefore expect nothing decisive till next sessions. meantime hope winter put stop ravages king 's ships employed carrying pitiful predatory war defenceless towns coasts disgraceful british fleet. army confined narrow limits kept state inaction superior power- danger apprehended without great reinforcement. upon whole aspect american affairs favourable reason expect tho must deplore precious blood shed englishmen countrymen horrid conflict. still undetermined dispose family winter. fear shall little command. dearest polly seems desirous fix new york improvement children. unhappy city much danger confusion justify measure least appears. events shall endeavour family weeks grow impatient tedious seperations. certain account england reason daily expect probable fate petition determine conduct. adieu dear honourd sir. present dutiful regards mamma every branch family believe ever affectionate dutiful son obedient servant jas duane ``

`` john adams abigail adams novr. 4. 1775 yesterday received octr. 21. letters following dates received. septr. 8. 10. 16. 29. oct. 1. 9. 21. 22. 1 letters indeed every line gives inexpressible pleasure notwithstanding melancholly scenes discribed late. happy learn family health hope continue. duty mother. wish would concerned. ought consider dissentery kill surely cannon. town secure cannon men war moon. wish little fortitude. rather kill 'd ball live continual fears. cant write often wish engaged 7 morning till 11. night. two pair colours belonging seventh regiment brought last night chambly hung mrs. hancocks chamber great splendor elegance. lady sends compliments good wishes. among hundred men almost house lives behaves modesty decency dignity discretion assure. behaviour easy genteel. avoids talking upon politicks. large mixed companies totally silent lady ought be-but whether eyes penetrating attention quick words looks gestures sentiments c. company would saucy way wont say. resume serious subject. ask write father sister heart wishes longs conception prevent. really fear shall ruin want exercise ``

`` samuel adams elizabeth adams dear philada. novr 7th 1775 last letter sent young mr gawen brown left place fortnight ago. know many written. wish would send dates receivd next. son informs late letter removing little cambridge. exceedingly pleasd sure could comfortable house dedham cold season. shall return habitation boston ever uncertain. barbarity enemies desolations wantonly made falmouth elsewhere presage probably befall town long endur 'd rage merciless tyrant. disgraced name britain added character ministry another indelible mark infamy. must content suffer loss things life rather tamely surrender publick liberty. eyes people britain seem fast closed ever opened rejoyce thank americans resisting tyranny manifestly intended overwhelm whole british empire. righteous heaven surely smile cause righteous country duty see end oppressions. whether shall live rejoyce friends liberty virtue fellow laborers common cause matter consequence. endeavor gods assistance act little part well-to approve self trust every thing concerns all-gracious providence. newspapers give account surrender garrison fort chambly major brown massachusetts. colors 7th regiment taken brought congress fryday last. wrote daughter long ago. hope receivd letter. remember sister polly friends. november 7 1775 believe dear betsy without formality repeating affectionately ``

`` john jay sarah jay dear wife philad. 23 decr. 1775 pleasure informing new york convention length made provision delegates vizt. 4 dollars per day attendance last congress shall great sufferer apprehended. allowance indeed means equal loss sustained appointment convention suppose consider honor equivalent residue. congress day refused give leave absence next week. five new york delegates coll. morris mr lewis absent either us leave town province would unrepresented. 1 expect however soon adjourn papa 2 engaged mr. hooper accompany elizabeth town hope shall soon happy. horses new shod wheels greased cloaths put every thing ready set early morning going congress morning pleasing expectations seeing christmas day disappointed. dont pity dear sally. however consolation congress adjourn less ten days determined stay till- depend upon nothing actual imprisonment able keep. present find objections congress reasonable sure would blame attempt leaving without permission. must endeavour resign self fate sure much good sence much regard permit disappointment occasion unavailing anxiety. tomorrow tuesday next congress believe determine time adjournmt. probable shall happiness wishing happy new year. adieu beloved. sincerely afft. john jay p.s. recd. letter rye old date. well usual. dined papa today. well. let intreat chearful keep spirits. know feelings kind disappointmts. disagreable 1 refiect mucll happy thousands fellow mortals uneasiness lost gratitude. december 23 1775 ``
